newsitem.title: USA: Florida boy calls emergency number over abuse.
newsitem.headline: Florida boy calls emergency number over abuse.

text.p: A nine-year-old Miami boy who said his stepfather beat him constantly, finally called the emergency number 911 to plead for help, police said on Friday.
Police rushed to the house and later arrested the man, Wayne Anthony Bevan, on a charge of aggravated child abuse.
The boy called Miami police on Tuesday afternoon when his stepfather left the house after allegedly giving him another beating.

"He picked me up and threw me on the floor really hard," the child told a 911 dispatcher. "I don't know where he is right now but when he comes home he says he's going to do something else to me and I'm very scared."
He gave his name and address then asked: "Can you help me...how long is it going to take you guys to come?"
The boy's mother Jenny Bevan has also been arrested on charges of child neglect. Relatives are looking after the boy, whose name was not released, and his younger brother.
